rComments: Amy was beyond great! I actually dreaded taking physics but she actually make it understandable! Her office hours were very helpful especially for the exams. The exams were basically the homework problems so make sure you do it!

Amy was amazing. I have been putting physics off for the longest time and I'm glad I started the series with her. She is very straightforward and easy to understand. She enjoys helping students and wants everyone to succeed. Go to her office hours, go to class, ask questions and you will be fine. I loved her.

Amy is a great physics teacher. Her class is simple; go to class, take notes, do hw, and get clarification at her Office hours. Her tests are just the Hw. The class is a breeze if you put the work in and learn the concepts. Would highly recommend

If every teacher taught the way Amy did, I'm pretty sure I would get A's in all my classes. She's very straight forward and goes over everything twice. Her tests are very fair, there's no trick questions and 80% of the test are exact problems from homework and class. If you do your homework and pay attention in class, you'll pass with an A.

Awesome professor. Amy really knows how to make Physics an interesting and fascinating subject, You can tell that she is incredibly passionate about most of what she teaches, which rubs off well on the students. She's super straight forward, inspiring, and makes class fun too. One of my favorite professors! Highly recommend taking physics with her.
